entry.title: Dreams
entry.content: Riku constantly has odd, lucid dreams about a woman he doesn't know reaching for him.

entry.title: T: The Basics
entry.content: Midorikawa Riku is a 17 year old kid who attends BlahBlah High School. He dislikes sitting still, and rarely does any homework, but his amazing memory allows him to do well on tests as long as he pays any attention. He is the school's sports star and MVP in track, soccer, and football.

entry.title: Dark Fire
entry.content: Riku's ability manifests as a dark fire that seems able to spread from his entire body. It burns very fiercely, and is hard for Riku to control.

entry.title: T: Rare Ability?
entry.content: Supposedly no one at the rescue has seen this ability before. Is it that rare?

entry.title: T: Disability?
entry.content: So i herd Riku got ADD.

entry.title: Ice
entry.content: Roman is an Ice user. He can only make ice form in his hands, though supposedly he should be able to freeze water in the air just by concentrating. Maybe he should train more.

entry.title: T: Vegan Majin?
entry.content: Roman doesn't eat flesh or anything that comes from animals, such as honey or eggs. That's pretty weird for a Majin.

entry.title: Old Kitchen Servant
entry.content: Roman used to be a servant in a kitchen back when he lived in Russia. He ran away when he found out that the meat he was cooking came from Majin that were no longer useful. That's also why he chose to become a vegan.

entry.title: Chef?
entry.content: Roman got his chef skills from his old position as a kitchen servant.

entry.title: T: Partners with Soume
entry.content: He's Soume's partner and acts weird around Soume.

entry.title: Feelings for Soume
entry.content: Roman be in lurve oooo

entry.title: Frail?
entry.content: Soume seems so strong during training, but he got ill in the hallway and had to sit down. His chest is full of bones...

entry.title: Effeminate!
entry.content: why soume so gurly.

entry.title: T: Age...?
entry.content: why soume so old.

entry.title: T: Plants!
entry.content: Soume is a plant user. He talks to them and is able to grow them from seeds in his hands. He can even collect pollen. No one knows the full potential of his power.

entry.title: T: Lactose Intolerant!
entry.content: Soume tried to eat some of Riku's strawberry shortcake and seemed to have some...stomach problems. He's probably allergic to dairy products.

entry.title: T: What does he eat?!
entry.content: Soume drinks a lot of water, but have you ever, ever seen him eat? Roman gets an answer from him, finally. He eats very sparingly, and rarely, because the only thing his stomach can tolerate is fresh, live meat.

entry.title: Childhood Suffering
entry.content: As a child, Soume suffered the worst experiences that anyone could imagine. He was abused emotionally, physically, and sexually by humans who wanted to break him. It explains a lot of his personality...

entry.title: T: Are Plants Aware?
entry.content: Soume is always talking to his plants, and unlike other plants, they MOVE to look at him sometimes! Are plants smarter than we think they are, or is that just Soume's special ability? He does create monster plants that listen to his commands...

entry.title: Traitor
entry.content: The family that Susa saved Soume from, the Akemiya, still had a hold over Soume these last 20 years. He's been working as a double agent...and he succeeded. The rescue has been destroyed, and countless killed.

entry.title: T: Temple Owner
entry.content: Crotchety lady who runs the temple. She looks maybe 25, but supposedly is over 80 years old. Dunno how that works.

entry.title: T: Gamer?
entry.content: Miss Susa really loves video games. She has a million of them in her room, and all kinds of consoles and controllers. Her favorite is Hunt Duck.

entry.title: Former Hunter
entry.content: Susa is the oldest daughter of the Kamiya family, one of the families that runs the Church of the Acts. She was raised to hunt Majin and has killed countless numbers of them. She was first in line to be the head of the family, but left when she realized the true extent of the pain she was causing, using her knowledge to save Majin instead. Soume was one of the first she saved, at least 20 years ago.

entry.title: ...girlfriend???
entry.content: Miss Susa likes women? And she was dating Liza? Weird. Wonder why they broke up.

entry.title: Siblings and children?
entry.content: Susa has a little brother, but she never mentions him. Her son, SonNameHere, was lost in the ambush Susa did 20 years ago in which Soume was rescued. That loss seems to be the reason Liza and her aren't together anymore.

entry.title: T: Allergies?
entry.content: Mamoru's hand was really red when he touched Soume's plants, but Riku was completely fine. Does he have allergies?

entry.title: Light Fire
entry.content: Mamoru also can use fire, though his fire is a strange, pale white color.

entry.title: T: Weirdo
entry.content: Mamoru is always so casual when he attacks, always poking fun and he sometimes leaves without doing anything. What's his whole deal?

entry.title: The Other Sister
entry.content: Mamoru says that Norah is his only sister, but he has another, an older sister...Miss Susa. He hates her because just before she left, she tried to kill him in his sleep.
